Uses of Class
eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.ds.AdvanceJDBCDataSource

  • Packages that use AdvanceJDBCDataSource 
    Package Description
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.ds
    Contains the ADVANCE datastore API record classes and interfaces.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl
    Default implementations of the Flow Engine API with local and remote options.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.cc
    Independent implementation of the Flow Engine Control Center until the OpenIDE-based version gets finished.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm
    Communication classes through various means: JDBC, JMS, SOAP, FTP, HTTP, etc.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.test
    Unit, algorithm and concept testing package.
